author: Jeroen Dewilde
quote: Exactly what I'm looking for! I love all the details about each Walk. I'm absolutely i love with this app! I also love that you can favorite walks and make a bucket list.

author: Jan Schepens
quote: As a child I was constantly outside searching for bugs and other creatures. Unfortunately that need to explore faded away as I became older. Now that I’ve been walking more often, Hikeventure has helped bring back that side of myself. I don’t just look at a plant and see a plant. I get close enough to see what could be crawling on that plant, and I want to know everything about it.

author: Jens Glorieux
quote: Love love love this app!!! It's so easy to find a place to walk, take photos, and share my adventures with my friends. I don't usually write reviews, but I had to here. I suggest this app to all my buddies.
